== Ubuntu Studio User Team Page ==

== Become a member ==

Becoming a member of Ubuntu Studio is the first step towards contributing to the Ubuntu Studio community.
* Join the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntustudio|~ubuntustudio]]</nowiki> launchpad team which allows you to comment on posts at <nowiki>[[http://ubuntustudio.org]]</nowiki>.
* Subscribe to the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/Ubuntu-Studio-users|Ubuntu-Studio-users]]</nowiki> mail list to keep up with announcements and community discussions regarding Linux Audio.
* Check in and say hi on '''#ubuntustudio''' at '''irc.freenode.net''' -  <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UbuntuStudio/IRC|Learn more about IRC]]</nowiki>.
